this_title: Emil Gilels: Live in Moscow, Vol.5
introduction: Another in VAI’s series devoted to the art of Russian pianist Emil Gilels. This fifth volume features Gilels in performances of two cornerstones of the piano literature: Tchaikovsky’s Piano Concerto No. 1 in B-flat minor and Schumann’s Piano Concerto in A minor.Color / *B&W, 79 minutes, 4:3, All regionsTchaikovskyPiano Concerto No. 1 in B-flat minor, Op. 23*(Live performance, 1966)SchumannPiano Concerto in A minor, Op. 54Encore: Arabesque, Op. 18(Live performance, 1976)Emil Gilels, pianoUSSR State Symphony OrchestraVladimir Verbitsky, conductor
chinese_title: Emil Gilels: Live in Moscow, Vol.5
